story_18_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Wow, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Thanks for such an incredible battle.
story_18_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
It stinks that we lost, but we did everything
we could.
story_18_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Yeah, truth be told, I feel really relieved.
story_18_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You and your team earned that victory.
All we can ask is that you keep moving
forward, for your sake and for ours!
story_18_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing all the things
you’re capable of from here on out.
story_18_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Until then... Hilbert? Hilda?
You ready to go?
story_18_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Pause, Cheren.
What are you acting out of character for?
story_18_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
It’s written all over your face. You want to see
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s growth firsthand.
story_18_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
You can’t hide it from us, Cheren.
We’re a team, after all!
story_18_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You two saw right through me, huh...
Well, I guess there’s no harm in asking.
story_18_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I know it’s a little sudden, but would it be OK if
I joined your team, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_18_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Thanks to my friends here, I’ve already gotten
so much stronger since the PML began...
just like my journey back in Unova.
story_18_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
If you let me join, I think we can learn from each
other’s experiences and bolster this team’s strength
as a whole. What do you say?
story_18_03000/2401_0401_1700_10: Thank you! I’ll do my best.
story_18_03000/2401_0302_1800_10: Let’s help each other win this!
story_18_03000/2401_0402_1900_10:
Absolutely! In fact, I think that moving forward,
teamwork is exactly what’s going to separate the
winners from the losers!
story_18_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Personally, I want us to win this!
So let’s put our hands and our hearts together
and make it happen as a team!
